overview:
Francesco is a high-tech entrepreneur. He is the co-founder of QualySense, a Swiss start-up that plans to revolutionize the quality control of grains, beans and seeds with its unique high-throughput sorting devices, which are able to sort millions of grains â€œone by oneâ€ at a very high-speed and with respect to biochemical properties.

Francesco holds a PhD in Spectroscopy (University of ZÃ¼rich, Switzerland), a Master in Aerospace Engineering (Politecnico di Milano, Italy, a Bachelor in Spacecraft and Vehicles (SUPAERO, France), and a Certificate of Applied Science (University of South Australia â€“ International Space University, Australia).

He enjoys working in the business domain and leading product development at 360Â° from technical, legal, sales and marketing aspects. Francesco is fast, reliable and responsible. He firmly believes that the only keys to success are human capital and multiculturalism.
